magma.title: Magma Design System
magma.description: Magma is a design system for building web applications. It is a collection of components, patterns, and guidelines that help you build consistent and beautiful web applications.

iconsauce.title: Iconsauce
iconsauce.description: Iconsauce is a library of icons for building web applications. It is a collection of icons that help you build consistent and beautiful web applications.
